72.heading: Macheras, Dimi.
72.title: Tsaani : the Grizzly Bear Story
72.author: art work by Dimi Macheras.
notes: Preface signed in type: Katherine Wade.
Copyright by Chickaloon Village Traditional Council.
"Premiere limited edition 150 prints."

Summary: "Out matched in strength and speed, faced with seemingly impossible odds, how will the Brave survive the ferocious Grizzly Bear? With only his wits and determination at his disposal, the young man will be put to the test in this ancient Athabascan tale."

135.heading: Machine Guns.
135.title: "Tiamotti!"
135.author: art by Liberatore ; written by Stefano Tamburini
135.appears_in: p. 61-67 in Video Clips (New York : Catalan Communicatons, 1985).
notes: Summary: Psychic probes around the city detect subversive thoughts, so that the thinkers can be eliminated. Each probe is connected to a policeman, who is welded to a machine gun. The policemen can only shoot if the probe detects mental subversion, however, and the protagonists try to defeat the system by not thinking about what they are doing.
